html:
2.28.20  2:36 am   im really scared i saw a fish with legs what should i do

      survive to tell the tale

2.28.20  1:37 am   The bass player in my band just turned me onto your music. Please tell me that you are not really an assistant buyer for a tech company that does this on the side. Might tour the west coast sometime?

     ok

2.28.20  1:34 am   bill im hungry what should i eat

      how about 1 pinecone

2.28.20  1:27 am   how many pinecones is too many

      2

2.28.20  1:08 am   you make me want to do something with my life haha

      you make me want to hear about what you are doing with your life

2.28.20  12:31 am   do you fear ai as an existential threat?

     no

      or will the smart robots become our pals

      hm, i never thought of it quite like that but yes

2.28.20  12:24 am   what is your favorite element on the periodic table

     hydrogen

      and why

      according to my research, which may be incorrect, that was the first one, which was able to eventually make all the others with the help of maybe some explosions

2.28.20  12:14 am   are you enjoy spring?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

2.27.20  11:55 pm   how long has 2+2 been four for?

      since the olden days

2.27.20  11:40 pm   How do you deal with self criticism?

     i can usually think of a pretty good comeback, in response

      Does it makes your life harder?

     no

2.27.20  11:03 pm   hey bill. really interesting what you said about finishing other people's sentences musically. it reminded me of a cool thing i've been noticing about myself. it's this thing i've started developing where i can sing along as if im playing my keyboard to songs i've never heard before. the cool part is, even with unordinary changes, i'm able to follow along and predict the right note to sing. this, to me, is one of the most highly regarded skills that I would want to learn on keys. what should I do to transfer this skill to my instrument?

     hm, i'm not sure, because the way i understood your explanation, it sounds like you can already do it

      would really love to be able to do it with chords too. thanks friend!

     all you have to do is spend more time with the instrument, away from the instrument, hearing songs while at the instrument, and hearing songs while away from the instrument

2.27.20  10:46 pm   How many roads must a man walk down?

      none. it is optional

2.27.20  9:30 pm   Are you using after effects now?

     absolutely not

      Or are you still on Movie Maker :)

      never was

2.27.20  9:21 pm   I'm moving out of my parents house. Any advice?

      you'll get to be your own parent. which is both fun and difficult

2.27.20  7:50 pm   What video are you doing next?

     i am more concerned with the videos i will do after that

      Is it a build-up towards another big, long, major video like the History Of ... series?

     absolutely not

      If not, then what is it?

     it is similar to back in 2013/2014 when i taught myself how to make videos and then began doing it and posting them ruthlessly online. actually, now that i am remembering properly, i started making them way before i knew how, which forced me to learn along the way. it will be similar again this time

2.27.20  6:52 pm   do you like answering these questions?

      it makes me stronger. and i like strength

2.27.20  6:40 pm   How do you do so much like answer all of these questions and make music and do all of the other stuff on this website. It truly is a feat 

      typically i try to just do as much as i can and then let people be mad at me for not doing everything else

2.27.20  6:26 pm   in response to 2.27.20  12:09 am , i put them into a list. i have stared at them for a while. what now?

      go through the list, and have a brief discussion about each entry, and talk about the logistics of what might tangibly be done on each one, and think specifically about first steps, for each one. write down your findings for each one. i like to keep the title of each subject in bold, and the details in non-bold

2.27.20  5:52 pm   whats the origin of the earth

      was a rock

2.27.20  5:29 pm   if i pretend to know what i'm doing, will i fool myself?

      i was going to say no but now that i thnk about it yes

2.27.20  4:58 pm   Where does time go as it passes?

      past

2.27.20  4:41 pm   What do you think about thinking? 

      it's like another world, in your mind!

2.27.20  4:18 pm   why is school

      could be fun

2.27.20  4:14 pm   I lost a thing and now one of the people i hate most gets it and i think i could still get it back but i dont quite know how to but it might be better if he has it but i also dont want him to have it because he is a bad person who i dont like along with many other people who are afraid to admit it so help. Inspire me.

      sounds like it's time for you to write a screen play

2.27.20  3:58 pm   hows steve from "hi,i'm steve"

      good, although i think his name is not steve

2.27.20  3:53 pm   Are you vibing right now?

      no but i will do it, i promise

2.27.20  3:44 pm   What's something fun to do?

      party/celebrate

2.27.20  3:21 pm   when do you sleep if you're always answering asks?

      in that case never, but that is not the case

2.27.20  3:17 pm   are people ever mean to you?

      yes but it makes me stronger

2.27.20  2:22 pm   I think "matrices" is really fun to say. Do you think so too?

      it's ok, but it makes me nervous because i feel it could cause people to forget the word 'matrix' and simply say 'matricee', when there is only one

2.27.20  2:12 pm   What type of rock is the moon made of?

      lunar

2.27.20  1:20 pm   I don't know how I'm supposed to feel

      you are supposed to alternate between good and bad, in a somewhat steady but still slightly unpredictable pattern

2.27.20  1:17 pm   Hi Bill. I love your videos and music so much if they were a sandwich, i'd eat them. My girlfriend also liked your work. More than me in fact. She doesn't like me anymore. We broke up. Everytime spotify puts your music on I get sad and I am reminded of her. How can I enjoy your music again without thinking about her?

     i have an idea: i will make more

      Thank you for filling a void in my stomach and I wish you all my best!

     thank you for your sudden outburst of friendiful sentiment, and good tidings

2.27.20  12:44 pm   what is your preferred food? 

      snackey cakes

2.27.20  11:51 am   How often do you listen to your own music

      only while working on it

2.27.20  11:09 am   Would you consider hiring/collaborating with someone who knows how to use blender?

      yes

2.27.20  10:57 am   If you can live on the moon, would you?

      not until it's a bit more ......................... habitable

2.27.20  10:35 am   who's the randiest person you know?

      you

2.27.20  10:24 am   are you working on another big project?

      it's similar to the one i did back in 2013/2014 where i learned how to make videos and then started doing it, and posting them ruthlessly online

2.27.20  10:06 am   It's snack time let's eat what are you eating ?

      meals

2.27.20  9:09 am   What are we even here for?

      each other, nature, some trinkets,

2.27.20  8:29 am   where did all the good times go?

      all around you, right now. that's where they went

2.27.20  8:14 am   what is a vital part of human life that society ignores?

      other societies

2.27.20  8:07 am   what to do when human beings are cruel?

      try to understand the whole story

2.27.20  7:51 am   Would you choose to own a Subaru Impreza WRX STi or a Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution?

      holy crap those look exactly the same. what the heck

2.27.20  7:19 am   What's your opinion on science 

      seems legit

2.27.20  6:36 am   Do you enjoy making your videos?

      yes but i am hoping to enjoy it more

2.27.20  5:12 am   i love the word dang. it's the best non-curse curse word substitute (for damn) of which im personally aware. we can go through the others: frick, frig, shiz, heck, etc. heck is okayish but the rest are dumpster substitutions for babies exclusively --  because only people barred from the good stuff would feel obliged to reach for these extremely lesser knockoffs. nobody is ever going to take down king fuck. nobody's ever TRYING to come for ass, and all of its versatility (dumbass, badass, smartass). and it's not even that damn is bad. damn has its own incredibly powerful energy, bringing a unique severity and dare i say solemnity to the table. but dang manages to create a space for itself that goes beyond mere substitution. dang conjures an entire mythos of cowboys and fathers hitting their thumbs with hammers while trying to nail together wooden planks. "dangit" manages to be more than an avoided "damnit," a mere damnit-lite. there's such a vast am ount of beauty in the word dang that i truly don't understand. how did it get like this, do you think, bill? why can't the other fake curses do this well in the vernacular?

      you may not want to hear this, but i really don't like that one. it seems very implausible to me

2.27.20  4:50 am   are u a knee person or a elbow person? 

     i am lucky enough to have both

      (also i love u a lot u r an inspiration)

2.27.20  4:48 am   do your songs have deep meanings

     yes

      or just uttered words

     there's music to go along with it too. that helps give the meaning some of its resonance

      (please answer this. this is my 3rd time asking it)

      i think i've answered it all 3 times
